name: Customizable Amiami Theme (Dark Default)
description: Changes Amiami Site to a default dark theme, which colors colors can be customized and add a custom image.
additional_info:
- Changed name from "Dark Amiami theme" to: "Customizable Amiami Theme (Dark Default)".
- Removed top banner with advertising.
- Added color pickers to change font, background, and border colors.
- Added an option to add a custom image background.
